news_header: The text discusses the rise of disinformation in Finland, particularly through the use of AI tools to create misleading content, often associated with far-right ideologies.
news_text: The text highlights the ability of anyone to produce seemingly credible yet misleading content using AI tools. It describes a Finnish disinformation campaign site that employs AI-generated images and narratives reminiscent of familiar national symbols. Disinformation is defined as intentionally spread false information, and the site analyzed promotes far-right messages and conspiracy theories. Experts note that the rise of generative AI has made it easier to produce and disseminate disinformation, leading to a potential crisis in information verification. The text also discusses how disinformation is now being propagated from societal elites, including politicians and influencers, and emphasizes the dangers posed by AI-generated content in spreading propaganda and misinformation. The situation in Finland is currently better than in other countries due to high education levels, but the challenges posed by AI are increasing.
